title: Portfolio of Gabriel
ai_cv_maker_description: Add your background, paste the job description, choose your preferred language or tone, and receive a polished CV plus cover letter in under a minute.
bookinvideo_description: Summary of the book Clean Code where I present situations in which it is possible to apply the concepts described in the book. I am migrating the platform from WordPress to Angular and Node
elleve_description: Elleve is an HR Tech and ED Tech company that financially supports employees' tuition fees for courses at partner educational institutions.
elleve_responsabilties: I worked on developing internal systems and financial integrations, creating scalable APIs and React interfaces for products used by thousands of users.
rb_description: R&B is a startup that offers product traceability systems using RFID (Radio-Frequency Identification) tags.
rb_responsabilties: I developed a web application for creating label layouts directly in the browser, using canvas. The solution reduced label creation time and significantly improved usability for non-technical users.
houpa_description: Houpa is a B2C and B2B platform for buying and selling in the fashion industry.
houpa_responsabilties: I developed reusable components in React for the e-commerce project and for the creation of responsive landing pages.
